resources.string: Polytech Nice-Sophia is the engineering school at the University of Nice - Sophia Antipolis. It is part of the national school consolidation of polytechnic network engineer (Ecole Polytechnique Universitaire).

Polytech Nice Sophia shows, clearly, it is commitment to openness to the industrial world. In a favorable environment, our school trains engineers with strong technical and scientific basis, with good corporate culture, able to communicate and start a new job or function. We offer training in line with business needs. 95% of our graduates finds employment within 3 months after the release of our school. We were born in 2005 from the consolidation of several engineers places.

Meetings Open Access or Install Parties: These evenings are open to all, whether you are curious, passionate, beginner or expert. Come test, discover and install Linux on your computer. Appointments one Tuesday a month from 17:30 to 19:30 • Tuesday, February 9 • Tuesday, March 8 • Tuesday, April 19 • Tuesday, May 10 Presentation of video games for students of the Master MAJE • Wednesday, March 9th from 10am Coffees Techno LC / INRIA Alumni • Monday, March 14th at 13h: part of the "brain week" meeting with Maureen Clerc, Pierre Faurre prize of the Academy of Sciences of business breakfasts • Thursday, March 3 from 8:30 to 10:30 " Comment développer ses réseaux dans la durée pour créer de la valeur ajoutée ", in collaboration with Agyca training • Friday, February 26 from 9:30 to 12:30: UNS Pod and video libraries • Thursday, March 10 from 13h to 16h: Publicize its research • Tuesday, March 22 from 14h to 17h: WIMS, online assessment exercises • Monday, April 25th from 14h to 17h: Screencast • Wednesday, May 25 from 14h to 17h: presentation Tools for interactive pedagogy • Friday, May 27 from 14h to 17h : electronic voting Boxes, classroom survey, pedagogy inversée Free Workshops • Thursday, February 11 from 14h to 17h: to design its posters and scientific poster with Inkscape
